short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the ancient and mystical atmosphere of Elden Castle every time you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings the serenity of a golden sunset captured above the clouds, creating a breathtaking backdrop for your browsing experience. Let the warm glow and rich colors of the sky transform your browser into a peaceful window to the horizon, where day meets night in a perfect blend of light and shadow.
